sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CMS_COMM_STAT ( STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, STAT_CITY, STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_BW, STAT_OS, STAT_REFERER, STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID ) VALUES ( #stat_key#, #stat_sessid#, #stat_key_nm#, #stat_city#, #stat_nat#, #stat_nat_cd#, #stat_bw#, #stat_os#, #stat_referer#, SYSDATE, #stat_raddr#, #stat_uid# )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM (
SELECT STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, STAT_CITY, STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_OS, STAT_BW, STAT_REFERER, STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID, STAT_UNM FROM ( SELECT STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, UPPER(STAT_CITY) STAT_CITY, UPPER(STAT_NAT) STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_OS, STAT_BW, STAT_REFERER, TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID, SF_USER_NM(STAT_UID) STAT_UNM FROM CMS_COMM_STAT ) WHERE 1 = 1
STAT_KEY IN ('USERMAN', 'APPLMAN')
STAT_KEY = #stat_key#
STAT_DT BETWEEN #srchFromDT# || ' 00:00:00' AND #srchToDT# || ' 23:59:59'
ORDER BY STAT_DT DESC ) TB ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #firstIndex# + 1 AND #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTCNT FROM ( SELECT STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, UPPER(STAT_CITY) STAT_CITY, UPPER(STAT_NAT) STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_OS, STAT_BW, STAT_REFERER, TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID, SF_USER_NM(STAT_UID) STAT_UNM FROM CMS_COMM_STAT ) WHERE 1 = 1
STAT_KEY IN ('USERMAN', 'APPLMAN')
STAT_KEY = #stat_key#
STAT_DT BETWEEN #srchFromDT# || ' 00:00:00' AND #srchToDT# || ' 23:59:59'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTCNT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = #stat_key# AND STAT_SESSID = #stat_sessid#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, TB.* FROM (
SELECT STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, STAT_CITY, STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_OS, STAT_BW, STAT_REFERER, STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID, STAT_UNM FROM ( SELECT STAT_KEY, STAT_SESSID, STAT_KEY_NM, UPPER(STAT_CITY) STAT_CITY, UPPER(STAT_NAT) STAT_NAT, STAT_NAT_CD, STAT_OS, STAT_BW, STAT_REFERER, TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') STAT_DT, STAT_RADDR, STAT_UID, SF_USER_NM(STAT_UID) STAT_UNM FROM CMS_COMM_STAT ) WHERE 1 = 1
STAT_KEY IN ('USERMAN', 'APPLMAN')
STAT_KEY = #stat_key#
STAT_DT BETWEEN #srchFromDT# || ' 00:00:00' AND #srchToDT# || ' 23:59:59'
ORDER BY STAT_DT DESC ) TB )

SELECT NVL(UPPER(STAT_NAT), 'UNKNOWN') CHARTDATA_KEY, COUNT(*) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN'
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
GROUP BY UPPER(STAT_NAT) ORDER BY CHARTDATA_VAL

SELECT NVL(UPPER(STAT_CITY), 'UNKNOWN') CHARTDATA_KEY, COUNT(*) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN'
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
GROUP BY UPPER(STAT_CITY) ORDER BY CHARTDATA_VAL

SELECT NVL(STAT_OS, 'UNKNOWN') CHARTDATA_KEY, COUNT(*) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN'
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
GROUP BY STAT_OS ORDER BY CHARTDATA_VAL

SELECT NVL(STAT_BW, 'UNKNOWN') CHARTDATA_KEY, COUNT(*) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN'
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
GROUP BY STAT_BW ORDER BY CHARTDATA_VAL

SELECT '0' AS CHARTDATA_SRZ, B.CTDATE || 'ì‹œ' AS CHARTDATA_KEY, NVL(CNT, 0) AS CHARTDATA_VAL FROM ( SELECT STAT_DT, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'HH24') STAT_DT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT A WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN'
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
) GROUP BY STAT_DT ) A, ( SELECT LEVEL - 1 AS CTDATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL - 1 <= 23 ) B WHERE A.STAT_DT(+) = B.CTDATE ORDER BY CTDATE

SELECT '0' CHARTDATA_SRZ, B.CTDATE CHARTDATA_KEY, NVL(CNT, 0) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM ( SELECT STAT_DT, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') STAT_DT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT A WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT#
) GROUP BY STAT_DT ) A, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#srchFromDT#, 'YYYYMMDD') + LEVEL - 1, 'YYYYMMDD') AS CTDATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY TO_DATE(#srchFromDT#, 'YYYYMMDD') + LEVEL - 1 <= TO_DATE(#srchToDT#, 'YYYYMMDD') ) B WHERE A.STAT_DT(+) = B.CTDATE ORDER BY CTDATE

SELECT '0' CHARTDATA_SRZ, B.CTDATE CHARTDATA_KEY, NVL(CNT, 0) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM ( SELECT STAT_DT, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') STAT_DT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT A WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT# ) GROUP BY STAT_DT ) A, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#srchFromDT#, 'YYYYMM'), LEVEL - 1), 'YYYYMM') AS CTDATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#srchFromDT#, 'YYYYMM'), LEVEL - 1) <= TO_DATE(#srchToDT#, 'YYYYMM') ) B WHERE A.STAT_DT(+) = B.CTDATE ORDER BY CTDATE

SELECT '0' CHARTDATA_SRZ, B.CTDATE CHARTDATA_KEY, NVL(CNT, 0) CHARTDATA_VAL FROM ( SELECT STAT_DT, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') STAT_DT FROM CMS_COMM_STAT A WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT# ) GROUP BY STAT_DT ) A, ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#srchFromDT#, 'YYYY'), (LEVEL - 1) * 12), 'YYYY') AS CTDATE FROM DUAL CONNECT BY ADD_MONTHS(TO_DATE(#srchFromDT#, 'YYYY'), (LEVEL - 1) * 12) <= TO_DATE(#srchToDT#, 'YYYY') ) B WHERE A.STAT_DT(+) = B.CTDATE ORDER BY CTDATE

SELECT COUNT(CONTACT_CNT) TOT_CNT, NVL(SUM(CONTACT_CNT), 0) TOT_CNT_IGNORE_DUP FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT# ORDER BY STAT_DT

SELECT COUNT(CONTACT_CNT) TOT_CNT, NVL(SUM(CONTACT_CNT), 0) TOT_CNT_IGNORE_DUP FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYYMM') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT# ORDER BY STAT_DT

SELECT COUNT(CONTACT_CNT) TOT_CNT, NVL(SUM(CONTACT_CNT), 0) TOT_CNT_IGNORE_DUP FROM CMS_COMM_STAT WHERE STAT_KEY = 'MAIN' AND TO_CHAR(STAT_DT, 'YYYY') BETWEEN #srchFromDT# AND #srchToDT# ORDER BY STAT_DT
